data.message: Would love to have a place on Facebook that I could save the recipes.  Would like to touch save recipe and it go to a special place

replies.message: Hi Margaret. You can save and bookmark some of the things you see on Facebook to view later, like the links or videos your friends post, upcoming events, Pages or photos. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2dlLvY3. When you save things on Facebook, they'll appear in your Saved Items that only you can see. You can view the items you've saved by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2dlMfwh. -Jessica
